trans-unit.source: Defines endpoint or contract behaviors that can export custom metadata.
trans-unit.target: Define os comportamentos de ponto de extremidade ou de contrato que podem exportar metadados personalizados.

trans-unit.source: To modify and extend the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) exported by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter> objects, implement the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension> interface on an endpoint, contract, or operation behavior (an object that implements either <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IContractBehavior>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior>, or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior>) and add the behavior to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.Behaviors%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.Behaviors%2A>, or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription.Behaviors%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para modificar e estender o WSDL Web Services Description Language () exportada por <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter> objetos, implementar a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension> interface em um comportamento de ponto de extremidade, contrato ou operação (um objeto que implementa o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IContractBehavior>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior>, ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior>) e adicionar o comportamento para o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.Behaviors%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.Behaviors%2A>, ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription.Behaviors%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: In addition, you can also implement <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension> on a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement>.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, você também pode implementar <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension> em um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension> implementations are never invoked if they are implemented as an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension> implementações nunca sejam invocadas se eles são implementados como um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension> does not export custom policy assertions even though [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] exports custom binding policy assertions to the appropriate element inside WSDL.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension> não exportar declarações de política personalizada, embora [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] exporta as declarações de política de associação personalizada para o elemento apropriado em WSDL.

trans-unit.source: If you want to export custom policy assertions, implement the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyExportExtension> interface.
trans-unit.target: Se você quiser exportar declarações de política personalizada, implemente o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyExportExtension> interface.

trans-unit.source: The metadata publication process begins by calling <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoints%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> which in turn calls <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> for each endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Inicia o processo de publicação de metadados chamando <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoints%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> chama <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> para cada ponto de extremidade.

trans-unit.source: The endpoint is exported by first exporting its contract.When exporting a contract the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter?displayProperty=nameWithType> calls the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportContract%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method on all <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension> implementations on the contract, and operation behaviors for that contract.
trans-unit.target: O ponto de extremidade é exportado pelo primeiro exportar seu contrato. Ao exportar um contrato a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter?displayProperty=nameWithType> chama o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportContract%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método em todos os <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension> implementações no contrato e comportamentos de operação para esse contrato.

trans-unit.source: Operations that use wildcard actions are not exported in metadata, so <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension> implementations on operation behaviors for these operations are not exported.
trans-unit.target: Operações que usam as ações de curinga não são exportadas em metadados, portanto <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension> implementações em comportamentos de operação para essas operações não são exportadas.

trans-unit.source: After exporting the contract, the port and binding are exported and exported policy expressions are attached.
trans-unit.target: Depois de exportar o contrato, a porta e associação são exportadas e exportados são anexadas a expressões de política.

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportContract%2A> and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportEndpoint%2A> methods provide access to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter> so that <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension> implementations can report recoverable errors and warnings through the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter.Errors%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Tanto o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportContract%2A> e o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportEndpoint%2A> métodos fornecem acesso ao <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter> para que <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension> implementações podem relatar erros recuperáveis e avisos por meio de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter.Errors%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The context objects passed into both methods provide convenient mappings from exported WSDL elements to properties of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> objects.
trans-unit.target: Os objetos de contexto passados para ambos os métodos fornecem convenientes mapeamentos de elementos WSDL exportados para propriedades de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> objetos.

trans-unit.source: If an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension> implementation throws an exception on export, the generated metadata is in an inconsistent state and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter> object should be discarded.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension> implementação lança uma exceção na exportação, os metadados gerado estão em um estado inconsistente e o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter> objeto deve ser descartado.

trans-unit.source: Custom export extension must run after the built-in serializer populates the service description.
trans-unit.target: Extensão de exportação personalizados deve ser executados após o serializador interno preenche a descrição do serviço.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension> that adds custom documentation attributes to the WSDL file as WSDL annotations.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código mostra um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension> que adiciona os atributos personalizados de documentação para o arquivo WSDL como anotações de WSDL.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter" /> that exports the contract information.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter" /> que exporta as informações do contrato.

trans-unit.source: Provides mappings from exported WSDL elements to the contract description.
trans-unit.target: Fornece mapeamentos de elementos WSDL exportados para a descrição do contrato.

trans-unit.source: Writes custom Web Services Description Language (WSDL) elements into the generated WSDL for a contract.
trans-unit.target: Grava elementos de WSDL (linguagem WSDL) personalizados na WSDL gerada para um contrato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportContract%2A> method is called when the metadata export system is exporting the contract.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportContract%2A> método é chamado quando o sistema de exportação de metadados está exportando o contrato.

trans-unit.source: Only contract and operation behaviors implementing <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension> get the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportContract%2A> call.
trans-unit.target: Comportamentos de contrato e operação únicos implementação <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension> obter o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportContract%2A> chamar.

trans-unit.source: All behaviors implementing <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension> get the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportEndpoint%2A> call.
trans-unit.target: Todos os comportamentos implementando <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension> obter o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportEndpoint%2A> chamar.

trans-unit.source: Use the `context` parameter to modify the WSDL to be exported.
trans-unit.target: Use o `context` parâmetro para modificar o WSDL a ser exportado.

trans-unit.source: For an example, see the Example section.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo, consulte a seção de exemplo.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension> that adds custom documentation attributes to the WSDL file as WSDL annotations.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código mostra um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension> que adiciona os atributos personalizados de documentação para o arquivo WSDL como anotações de WSDL.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter" /> that exports the endpoint information.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter" /> que exporta as informações do ponto de extremidade.

trans-unit.source: Provides mappings from exported WSDL elements to the endpoint description.
trans-unit.target: Fornece mapeamentos de elementos WSDL exportados para a descrição do ponto de extremidade.

trans-unit.source: Writes custom Web Services Description Language (WSDL) elements into the generated WSDL for an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Grava elementos WSDL (linguagem WSDL) personalizados no WSDL gerado para um ponto de extremidade.

trans-unit.source: Implement the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportEndpoint%2A> method to modify the WSDL exported for an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Implementar o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportEndpoint%2A> método para modificar o WSDL exportado para um ponto de extremidade.

trans-unit.source: This method is called after the contract has been exported by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportContract%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado depois que o contrato foi exportado por <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportContract%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension> that adds custom documentation attributes to the WSDL file as WSDL annotations.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código mostra um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension> que adiciona os atributos personalizados de documentação para o arquivo WSDL como anotações de WSDL.
